Not a valid username Password must be >5 characters "Login failed" Home Setting Recycle Bin Account My Profile Change Password Open navigation drawer Close navigation drawer Share Delete More Share content Delete content More options Login Keep me logged in Forgot password Please register here! Save to device Sign Up Sign up Cancel Save 1dp Reset password Reset Enter old password Enter new password Confirm new password Update Select the following methods to\nprovide feedback to the developer Introduction to Mahiru Mahiru is a photo storage app, created to store unlimited photos\nand completely free of charge. For more information, contact via email: meomeo123@gmail.com Enter name Update information Dark mode Clear cache How to upload photos/videos/music? To upload photos/videos/music, tap the upload button or long-press the upload button to select the file you want to upload How to download photos/videos/music to your phone? To download photos/videos/music to your phone, long-press the photo/video/music you want to download, then tap the More (three vertical dots) button and tap Download image Undo Select all Sort Image Video Music Cut Draw Filter Edit Recover Sign out Feedback Information Support
